sentences.sContent: The tough thing is trying to instil a winning attitude in the kids.
sentences.sCn: 困难在于要尽力给孩子们灌输胜利的心态。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + stil(掉) → 掉到里面 → 滴注； 逐渐灌输

trans.tranCn: 滴注； 逐渐灌输； 逐步培养
trans.tranOther: to teach someone to think, behave, or feel in a particular way over a period of time
